name: Surge Defense (Prototype)
description:
(FYI, Windows build only for now. I don't have a Mac or Linux computer to test on.)

Surge Defense is a tower defense RPG that focuses on fluid strategy and relationships between towers. With blasters, photon rockets, and domesticated bugs, defend your computer from an onslaught of virtual invaders.

This is a VERY early prototype for a game that I have been working on with a partner. Although we certainly want to try our best to execute well on the staples of the tower defense genre, with the game's tower synergy system and a yet-to-be implemented skill tree (a la Defender's Quest), we hope to create a tower defense game that really emphasizes players making choices about the way they play, and the types of powers that interest them.

This prototype will be updated with some more levels, enemies, and upgrades in the coming weeks. Feel free to comment below with thoughts, email me at idjones@usc.edu, or tweet me @DragonTechno.
